Attaches a collapsible div's id to a tag

Typical to attach to a button or link tag (see builder).

bs_attach_collapse(tag, id_collapse)

Arguments

tag
htmltools tag,
id_collapse
character, id for the collapsible div

Value

tag, modified copy of tag

Details

You may attach a collapsible div's id to more than one tag.

See also

https://getbootstrap.com/javascript/#collapse

Other collapse.functions: bs_collapse

Examples

library("htmltools")
bs_collapse(id = "id_yeah", tags$p("Yeah Yeah Yeah"))
#> <div class="collapse" id="id_yeah">
#>   <p>Yeah Yeah Yeah</p>
#> </div>
tags$button("She Loves You") %>%
  bs_attach_collapse("id_yeah")
#> <button data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#id_yeah">She Loves You</button>
